name: Coastal Tour 3- 4 Hours
description:
Have a relaxing bike ride on the beautiful "Malecon"and enjoy a stunning view over the whole bay of Lima. Explore three of the districts that face the sea and whose life revolves around it.

Miraflores, with its amazing boardwalk overlooking the beaches, one of surfers favorite places. Barranco, a bohemian neighborhood and favorite of poets and intellectuals. The tour includes a visit to Canta Rana Restaurant were we will be delighted with some typical Peruvian coastal food.
Last but not least have a ride along what was once a small fishing village, Chorillos. Where you can take the best photos of the Costa Verde.
